QuestData.Title: They Came From Above
QuestData.Description: Please, traveler, I need your help.$B$BAruuna, my home, has been destroyed by the arakkoa. They swooped down from their spires and killed anyone who tried to escape. My family... did not make it out.$B$B My brother Barum stayed behind to find his daughter amidst the chaos. I beseech you, please, go to Aruuna and find Barum.$B$BHe is the only family I have left.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Crystal-Shaper Barum near Aruuna in Talador.
